data.title: bd-3av: Search workspaces when review not found locally
data.description:
Problem: Reviews created in jj workspaces were not visible when running crit commands from the repo root, causing duplicate review creation.

Solution: Added workspace search helpers:
- find_review_in_workspaces(): Searches all workspaces for a review
- get_review_or_suggest_path(): For read-only commands
- require_local_review(): For write commands, errors with --path hint

Updated review commands: show, request, approve, abandon, merge, vote, review

data.reason: Security review passed. No issues found: workspace paths sourced from jj internal state (not user input), SQL queries use parameterized statements, error handling is appropriate.
